document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 98-08
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, STATE OF CALIFORNIA, AMENDING CHAPTER 2.28 AND CHAPTER 2.32 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE PERTAINING TO THE DATE OF APPOINTMENT AND ELIMINATING TERM LIMITS FOR BOARD AND COMMISSION MEMBERS
